meshIneBits.gui.view2d

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • meshIneBits.gui.view2d.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    class Controller
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    The controller, linking 2D views and part (so-called Mesh). It observes the Mesh and its Layers. Observed by Core and Wrapper. A singleton.
